page.title: 16THE MORETON MASSEY
page.content: In Moreton there are two pubs,the one in our block is called The Moreton Massey.It is owned by Mr.&Mrs Bodycomb.Outside the pub there is a green with tables and chairs,a childrens playground and a large car park that can take up to 80 cars. Inside the pub is one bar and a restaurant. Drinks and bar food are sold in the bar and 3 course meals are sold in the restaurant. Onaverage 650 people visit the pub in a week. There are special days when it is very busy; the Village Fayre in July, the fancy dress party on Christmas Eve, The Tug o-er Water Match over the river on Boxing Day,Meetings of the Ongar Round Table,and when the Moreton Ladies Club meet at the pub.Mr.Bodycomb employs 5 fulltime staff and 12 part time staff. The inside of the pub looks very old. It has old oak beams and brick walls.
